bibl.title: The Old Nubian Memorial for King George.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Scholarly methodology. - Editorial procedure. - Abbreviations and glossing conventions. - Transcription and translation of the Greek inscription. - Transcription and translation of the Old Nubian inscription. - Grammatical analysis of the Old Nubian inscription. - A note on the 'two dominions'. - A note on the grammatical analysis of the Old Nubian ⲗ-morpheme.

bibl.title: Nubian Voices. Studies in Christian Nubian Culture

bibl.seg: Vincent W.J. van Gerven Oei, The Old Nubian Memorial for King George.

Adam Łajtar & Jacques van der Vliet (edd.), with the assistance of Grzegorz Ochała & Giovanni Ruffini, Nubian Voices. Studies in Christian Nubian Culture = The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume XV (Warsaw, 2011) pp. 225-262, 1 fig.

Introduction. - Scholarly methodology. - Editorial procedure. - Abbreviations and glossing conventions. - Transcription and translation of the Greek inscription. - Transcription and translation of the Old Nubian inscription. - Grammatical analysis of the Old Nubian inscription. - A note on the 'two dominions'. - A note on the grammatical analysis of the Old Nubian ⲗ-morpheme.
